summary: Adds \"Dwemer Crossbows\" a functionally identical crossbow that can actually be used by followers.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod, adds a craftable crossbow called the Dwemer Crossbow (for easy identification) that is functionally identical to the Dwarven crossbows but doesnt suffer from the weird bug that stops them firing. Can be upgraded to Enhanced Dwemer Crossbow and can be improved at the grinding wheel.

***
Installation: Simply put the .nif file in meshes/weapons/dwarven and activate the .esp. 

***
Requires Dawnguard
author: Crowley
